main.name: Juan Pablo Sanchez
main.description: currently studying systems engineering and i am in my 7th semester with the desire to continue in the world of development.
main.bio: I am a person fond of learning more and more things every day,I love everything related to technology and the advancement of this same, I am from Bogota Colombia, I am currently studying systems engineering at the Javeriana University, I love to program things in c++ and keep learning new things from the web environment.
